title: IoT Based Smart Irrigation System for Precision Farming. Team Krishi-Shakti

tasks.task: Presenting a problem statement and proposing a smart irrigation system
subtasks: Explain the problem of water scarcity in agriculture
Describe the limitations of traditional irrigation methods
Present the benefits of using a smart irrigation system
Detail the components of the robotic car, including sensors and controls
Explain how IoT and AI are utilized in data analysis
Describe the user interface for displaying collected data
Discuss the integration of GPRS for vehicle location tracking

tasks.task: Demonstrate the functionality of the smart irrigation system
subtasks: Explain the process of soil testing and monitoring
Describe the use of sensors for soil moisture, temperature, and nutritional analysis
Illustrate the role of the ESP8266 in controlling the system
Show how real-time data influences irrigation scheduling
Demonstrate the motor control for the fertilizer pump based on farmer input

tasks.task: Conclude the presentation and thank the audience
subtasks: Acknowledge the support of the farming community (Prishyajan)
Appreciate the viewers for their time
Thank for considering the proposed solution (smart irrigation system)
